title: Phallery
description: To celebrate Africa and showcase the continent to the world, captivating photographs does the trick. On this platform, photographers (hobbyists or professionals) upload photographs that shows the true story of the continent. Uploaded photos can be liked, loved, and commented on.

title: Personal Website
description: This is my personal portfolio website. It was created to help me reach out to people swiftly and get access to opportunities that come by.

title: WebBuddy
description: While browsing, there may be a need to copy a link, organize websites to surf, or make a quick to-do list; WebBuddy does all. It solves the need to take a quick note without opening another app: all is served in the browser.
